title: Northwest Smith
description: His eyes flash like steel in his weathered face. His worn spacer's leathers tell a tale of challenge met, hardship endured. Engraved on his memory are the secrets of a hundred ancient alien races.Here is the mystery and glory of the universe. Here is a legend come to life. Here is Northwest Smith.Contents:Shambleau.Black Thirst.The Tree of Life.Scarlet Dream.Dust of the Gods.Lost Paradise.Julhi.The Cold Gray God.Yvala.Song in a Minor Key.
author: C.L. Moore
